meanings.definition: A day of festivity or recreation when no work is done.
meanings.sent1: During the holidays, we celebrate with family and friends.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to the holidays because I can relax and enjoy myself.
meanings.sent3: The holidays are like a mini-vacation from our daily routines.
meanings.sent4: The festive spirit of the holidays fills the air with joy and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The holidays bring a sense of happiness and togetherness to everyone.

meanings.definition: A period of cessation from work or one of recreation; vacation.
meanings.sent1: We went on a beach holiday during the summer.
meanings.sent2: The winter holidays are a great time to travel and explore new places.
meanings.sent3: Taking a holiday helps us recharge and come back refreshed.
meanings.sent4: In a way, a holiday is like pressing the reset button for our minds.
meanings.sent5: The anticipation of a holiday can make the days leading up to it exciting.
